SEARCH
Package org.loboevolution.html.style

Class StyleSheetAggregator

java.lang.Object
org.loboevolution.html.style.StyleSheetAggregator
public class StyleSheetAggregator extends Object
Aggregates all style sheets in a document. Every time a new STYLE element is found, it is added to the style sheet aggreagator by means of the addStyleSheet(CSSStyleSheetImpl) method.
